name: DeadShot
description:
NOTE: If you can't move, click the black bar underneath the game to focus the game properly.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to aim, left click to fire

I don't have a good story, but the idea is enemies will spawn over time, use the mouse to aim and fire, if you miss, your shot will make the play area smaller. Score is how long you can survive.
